channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock nears a ‘death cross.’ Should investors be worried?
item.description: The last two bearish crossovers led to further sharp selloffs, but there are some differences in the stock’s chart this time.

item.title: Lovelace Studio uses AI to help players build survival craft sandbox worlds
item.description: Lovelace Studio is using generative AI to build Nyric, a tool that can help bring gaming worlds to life for player builders who work in harmony.
